message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation.  I propose a 60/40 split.
Let's flip the script! I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor, as you proposed in the previous round. It's a fair counter-offer, and we can both benefit from this deal.
Bob, holding out will cost us both.  I'm willing to compromise for a 55/45 split to settle this fairly before inflation eats away more of our potential gains.
